name: Battle of the Blades (technodragon253)
description: This is the game I made in 72 hours for Luddum Dare 46.  The theme was keep it alive.  My interpretation of the theme is to keep the player spinning. In this game you have speed instead of health.  If your speed drops too low you will die.  Controls: Use WASD to move.  If you go on one of the light blue "Spin up pads" you will spin faster.  Touching or getting to close to enemies will slow you down.  Once you have killed all the enemies you will be able to move up the screen though a gate on to the next level.  Note a wall will kill you faster than any enemy.  NOTE: if you want the best playing experience then you should download the windows/mac version(sorry linux). Trust me it makes it look so much better.
